body:
Comment 6 by **jonas@pfenniger.name**: 
@dave the issue is not a stale repo, I did it multiple times with and without the GOROOT

@rsc any ideas how I can trace the program execution on OSX ? I tried GDB without
success. I'm wondering if it's a scheduler issue since the other precompiled go program
showed the issue too. If you can send me a short binary I could test it on a 3rd case.
